item.title: A short guide to Markdown syntax
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight and easy-to-use syntax for styling all forms of writing on the Web. This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme. Compare the source file, in markdown-syntax.md in my Git repository, to see how the Markdown content is rendered in this HTML output. For more details, see GitHub Flavored Markdown.
